title: PC Fonts
content:
Hi Folks!

We have an urgent question belonging to PC fonts.  
We have derived a font (working on Mac FontLab) and want to create a font usable on PC.  
I have found so long options fpr creating the classic Mac suitcase fonts, another for Macintosh TrueType.  
But I didn’t find anything for making PC fonts (actually we tried the Mac TrueType- doesn’t run on PC)  
What is the solution?

Thanks so far!  
Stefan
